H0.text: What is the official language of the People's Republic of Bangladesh. Urdu

H1.text: What is the official language of the People's Republic of Bangladesh. English

H2.text: What is the official language of the People's Republic of Bangladesh. Hindi

H3.text: What is the official language of the People's Republic of Bangladesh. Bengali

A4.text: The official and predominant language of Bangladesh is Bengali

A5.text: English plays an important role in Bangladesh's judicial and educational affairs
